original_text: The Jewish leaders answered, ‘We do not want to kill you because of any good things that you have done. We want to kill you because you are speaking against God. You are only a man, but you are saying that you are God.’
korean_text: 유대인들이 대답하되 선한 일로 말미암아 우리가 너를 돌로 치려는 것이 아니라 신성모독으로 인함이니 네가 사람이 되어 자칭 하나님이라 함이로라

sentences.original_text: We do not want to kill you
because of any good things that you have done
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 행한 어떤 선한 일 때문이 아니라

sentences.original_text: because you are speaking against God
but you are saying that you are God
